price: “Iyo tuza kugira urwibutso tuvanye ku bo hambere (mbere y’uko Intumwa Muhamadi ihabwa ubutumwa),
arabic: لَوۡ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكۡرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: law anna ʿindanā dhik'ran mina al-awalīna
